Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-21506 affecting package python-pymongo for versions less than 4.2.0-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-21506 affecting package python-pymongo for versions less than 4.2.0-9. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-pymongo is earlier than 4.2.0-9, affected by CVE-2024-21506
